results.description: Use ts_delta(operating_income,1) to capture short-term operating-income momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using operating_income (high userCount). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field). Coverage=0.5 so I apply ts_backfill when needed in production; here we present core formula. Confidence set to 0.60 because earnings momentum is meaningful but noisy.

Compare current operating_income vs 4 quarters ago to capture seasonal growth. Used operating_income (high userCount) per SUGGESTION4. Applied ts_backfill in practice due to coverage 0.5. SUGGESTION2 not used. Confidence 0.65.

Value signal: cash divided by enterprise_value to find cash-rich cheap firms. Applied SUGGESTION1 combining two fields; both have high userCount. Data coverage 0.5 so ts_backfill advised before live use. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.70.
Profitability per invested capital: operating_income / invested_capital. Used two high-userCount fields per SUGGESTION1/4. ts_backfill recommended due to coverage. Confidence 0.68.
Free cashflow-style yield using annual cashflow / enterprise_value. SUGGESTION1 used two fields with high userCount. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill in pipeline. Confidence 0.72.
ts_delta(sales,1) captures recent revenue acceleration. SUGGESTION1 & 4: sales has very high userCount. Coverage low -> ts_backfill for missing quarters. Confidence 0.62.
Seasonal revenue growth using ts_delta(sales,4). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill recommended. Confidence 0.66.
Change in operating efficiency: operating_income divided by sales; cross-compare to history in production. Used two large fields per SUGGESTION1/4. ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.67.
Accruals measure: subtract(cashflow, income) (cashflow minus net income) to detect earnings quality issues. Used high-user fields per SUGGESTION4. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.64.

ROA approx: divide(pretax_income, assets_curr) and measure ts_delta over 4 quarters. Applied SUGGESTION1 combining profitability and assets (both well-used). Will ts_backfill in prod. Confidence 0.63.
Value/liquidity stress: divide(cogs, inventory) identifies inventory-intensive firms. Used two common fields per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage low -> backfill when needed. Confidence 0.60.

Growth/quality signal: divide(rd_expense, sales) to find high R&D ratio firms (innovation proxy). Applied SUGGESTION1; rd_expense has good userCount. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill in pipeline. Confidence 0.58.
Leverage normalized by size: divide(debt, enterprise_value). SUGGESTION1 & 4 used large userCount fields. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill recommended. Confidence 0.66.
Rising long-term debt over year can signal risk or investment. Used debt_lt (high userCount) per SUGGESTION4. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.55.
Balance-sheet efficiency trend: quarter-over-quarter change in working_capital. SUGGESTION1 used working_capital (high userCount). Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill advised. Confidence 0.60.
Detect extreme current_ratio via zscore(current_ratio). SUGGESTION1 used single high-user field. Because coverage 0.5, ts_backfill in production. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.57.

Liquidity measure: divide(cash, fnd6_dlcch) (cash / current debt changes) where fnd6_dlcch proxies current debt changes. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields). Coverage 0.5 -> backfill before use. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Earnings surprise proxy: ts_delta(operating_income,1) normalized cross-sectionally
results.description: Short-term ops surprise proxy: ts_delta(operating_income,1) then zscore across cross-section. SUGGESTION1 used high-user field; ts_backfill applied in practice. Confidence 0.63.
Revenue-per-share momentum using sales_ps (high userCount). SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Enterprise value to sales decline (value entry)
results.description: Cheapness via ts_delta(divide(enterprise_value, sales),4). Uses two major fields per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill advised. Confidence 0.65.
Improving operating expense ratio signals margin expansion. Two fields used as per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill for missing data. Confidence 0.62.
Track 4-quarter net income change. income has high userCount (per SUGGESTION4). Coverage low -> ts_backfill in production. Confidence 0.64.
Margin improvement using pretax_income and sales. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.61.
Lower capex/sales suggests improving free-cashflow potential. Used fnd6_capxv and sales per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill advised. Confidence 0.56.
High goodwill relative to assets may signal impairment risk: divide(goodwill, assets_curr). Both widely-used fields (SUGGESTION4). Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.50.
Growing investment cash outflows/inflows may indicate capex cycles. Used cashflow_invst (good userCount). Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill in pipeline. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Cash flow from financing spike detection (ts_delta(cashflow_fin,1))
results.description: Detect large financing activity (buybacks/issuance) via cashflow_fin delta. SUGGESTION4 used. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill recommended. Confidence 0.53.
Quarterly change in shares repurchased signals capital allocation. Uses total shares repurchased field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill suggested. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Sales per share vs net income divergence (zscore(divide(sales_ps, income)))
results.description: Detect revenue growth without profit via ratio sales_ps/income and zscore cross-sectionally. Two fields used as SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.55.
High recent volatility in operating_income can signal instability; use ts_std_dev over 8 periods. Single high-user field per SUGGESTION4. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill. Confidence 0.52.
Liquidity runway: divide(cash, operating_expense) to estimate months of coverage (proxy). Two common fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.69.
Rapid change in EV/sales signals revaluation; used two large fields per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill recommended. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Inventory build vs sales slump (subtract(ts_delta(inventory,1), ts_delta(sales,1)))
results.description: Rising inventory with falling sales is negative signal. Two fields combined per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill in production. Confidence 0.63.
Cash conversion: cashflow / income to detect accruals/mythical earnings. Two high-user fields per SUGGESTION4. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill recommended. Confidence 0.71.
Cross-sectional profitability ranking using income/assets_curr. SUGGESTION1 & 4 applied. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill before use. Confidence 0.68.
Information ratio of operating_income over 8 periods (trend vs volatility). Single high-user field used (SUGGESTION4). Coverage 0.5 -> backfill advised. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Enterprise value to EBITDA shrinkage (divide(enterprise_value, fnd6_newa1v1300_ebitda))
results.description: Value relative to EBITDA using enterprise_value and EBITDA; both fields have decent coverage and userCount. SUGGESTION1 applied. Backfill recommended. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cash to debt improvement (subtract(divide(cash, debt), ts_delay(divide(cash, debt),4)))
results.description: Improving cash/debt ratio vs 4 quarters ago signals de-leveraging. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.65.

results.description: Sales growing faster than EV expansion suggests undervaluation. Two big fields used per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Working capital to sales improvement (ts_delta(divide(working_capital, sales),4))
results.description: Improving WC/sales indicates better cash conversion. Two fields used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.60.

results.description: Approx per-share valuation using EV divided by common shares outstanding; SUGGESTION1 used two large fields. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill recommended. Confidence 0.62.

results.description: Rising cash and falling capex can free up FCF. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill in production. Confidence 0.59.

results.description: ROIC trend over year by combining operating_income and invested_capital. SUGGESTION1 & 4 used. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Earnings quality: cashflow > income over 4 quarters (subtract(ts_mean(cashflow,4), ts_mean(income,4)))
results.description: Persistent positive cashflow minus income suggests quality; used two high-user fields per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill. Confidence 0.70.

results.description: Revenue per unit of enterprise value to find revenue-rich cheap firms. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1/4. Coverage 0.5 -> backfill. Confidence 0.63.

results.description: Find instruments at seasonal peaks using ts_arg_max over 8 periods. Operating_income has high userCount. Coverage 0.5 -> ts_backfill in production. Confidence 0.50.
